name: Playtime Pets - Pony
description:
Imagine all the fun you can have with your new pet!

Pick your pony, choose a name, and personalize him or her with colors and accessories! Take care of your pet pony too; make sure it’s healthy, clean, and happy!

Ponies are some of the most mischievous little creatures in the magical world of PlayTime Pets. They love to play, jump, cuddle, and be tickled.

Ponies are very whimsical as well and love to try out different looks and accessories. Make sure to give your pony a lot of attention and love!

There’s a pet pony for everyone! Download My Pet Pony today and meet you newest pet!

DISCOVER ALL THE FUN THINGS YOU CAN DO WITH YOUR NEW PET PONY!
*Feed your pony with all kinds of food from the store
*Enjoy the 5 mini-games included in the app and win coins for your pet pony
*Choose, personalize, and name your pony
*Choose between thousands of different colors and accessories for your pony
*Check the status of your pony and make sure it’s healthy and happy
*Change the app settings to take better care or your pet pony
*Enjoy watching your baby pony grow up!

Playtime Pets
Are you ready to have your very own pet? What about a whole family of magical pets? Collect your magical pets one-by-one starting with the original Playtime Pet: My Pet Pony!
